from itertools import combinations

N = int(input())
L = list(map(int, input().split()))

comb = combinations(L, 3)

count = 0
for c in list(comb):
    if c[0] + c[1] > c[2] and c[1] + c[2] > c[0] and c[2] + c[0] > c[1]:
        count += 1

print(count)
from itertools import combinations

l = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())))

count = 0

    if i[0] + i[1] > i[2]:
        count += 1

print(count)

#!/usr/bin/python

from itertools import combinations

n = int(input())
l = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())))

count = 0
for i in combinations(l, 3):
    if i[0] + i[1] > i[2]:
        count += 1

print(count)
